# transform

**Instance Property**

The transform of an entity relative to its parent.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var transform: Transform { get set }
```

## Discussion

For an [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnchorEntity] instance, the transform is relative to the AR anchor.
title: transform
